data.comment: The match is underway at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Goias.
In the minute 3, Corinthians drive upfield and Victor Cantillo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goias defender.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Can Goias capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Corinthians's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In Goiania Goias attack through Mike. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 10, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Goias's half.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Corinthians's Gustavo Silva breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Goias close to the penalty box.
Attention is being given to Goias’s Ratinho and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 21, Goias are pushing forward but Daniel Bessa's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Ratinho is back on his feet again.
In the minute 21, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Goias throw-in in Corinthians's half.
In the minute 23, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Serra Dourada, Ramiro has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
It's now 0-1 thanks to an own goal from Fabio Sanches.
Great play from Ramiro to set up the goal.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Goias.
In the minute 30, Vinicius Lopes for Goias has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and receives a first yellow card.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Goias just outside Corinthians's area.
In the minute 34, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Goias have a goal kick.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Goiania, Ramiro (Corinthians) misses the target with a header.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 40, Goias surge into the attack at Serra Dourada but Rafael Vaz’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 41, Corinthians's Jo misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 43, Daniel Villalva (Goias) strikes at Serra Dourada but his header is cleared.
Cassio is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Cassio has recovered and rejoins the match in Goiania.
In the minute 45, Goias to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Serra Dourada.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Goias.
The first-half is over at Serra Dourada.
The second-half is now underway.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 46, Goias make their first substitution with Ignacio Jara replacing Daniel Villalva.
Gabriel is replacing Guilherme Camacho for the away team.
In the minute 47, Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goias pushes forward through Ignacio Jara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Corinthians have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 54, Mike for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 59, Kevin Quevedo is on a sub for Ratinho for Goias.
The home team replace Mike with Miguel Figueira.
Corinthians drives forward and Fagner gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 62, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goias will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Corinthians.
In the minute 65, Goias to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Vinicius Lopes is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Miguel Figueira instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Goias.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 70, Tiago Nunes is making the team's second substitution at Serra Dourada with Leo Natel replacing Ramiro.
Romulo Otero is replacing Gustavo Silva for the away team.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 74, Goias have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Goias's half.
Corinthians are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Goias.
Free kick Goias.
Goias needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 79, The away team replace Victor Cantillo with Ederson.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Goias's area.
In the minute 81, Corinthians are coming forward and Romulo Otero gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goias have a goal kick.
Douglas Baggio is replacing Vinicius Lopes for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Luan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Corinthians.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 83, Throw-in high up the field for Corinthians in Goiania.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 85, Tiago Nunes (Corinthians) is making a fifth substitution, with Angelo Araos replacing Luan.
Douglas Baggio of Goias is pulled up for offside.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Goias.
In the minute 89, Free kick Goias.
Corinthians's Fagner has been booked in Goiania.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Serra Dourada.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Goal! Danilo Avelar heads Corinthians into a 1-2 lead.
That's a fine assist from Romulo Otero.
Romulo Otero (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
